body_html:
I just logged into our docker container used for a gpu pip test, and here is what I see.
libcudnn.so location: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so
$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64

$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/lib64
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 24 Aug 15 2015 /usr/local/cuda/lib64 -> targets/x86_64-linux/lib

$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/lib
ls: cannot access /usr/local/cuda/lib: No such file or directory
body_text:
I just logged into our docker container used for a gpu pip test, and here is what I see.
libcudnn.so location: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so
$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64
$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/lib64
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 24 Aug 15  2015 /usr/local/cuda/lib64 -> targets/x86_64-linux/lib
$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/lib
ls: cannot access /usr/local/cuda/lib: No such file or directory
body:
I just logged into our docker container used for a gpu pip test, and here is what I see.
libcudnn.so location: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so
$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64

$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/lib64
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 24 Aug 15  2015 /usr/local/cuda/lib64 -> targets/x86_64-linux/lib

$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/lib  
ls: cannot access /usr/local/cuda/lib: No such file or directory
